mapper.sql: id, wx_id, wx_sex, wx_name, wx_province, wx_city, state, id_no, mobile
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO user ( id, wx_id, wx_sex, wx_name, wx_province, wx_city, state, id_no, mobile ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{wxId}, #{wxSex}, #{wxName}, #{wxProvince}, #{wxCity}, #{state}, #{idNo}, #{mobile} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
UPDATE user
wx_id = #{wxId},
wx_sex = #{wxSex},
wx_name = #{wxName},
wx_province = #{wxProvince},
wx_city = #{wxCity},
state = #{state},
id_no = #{idNo},
mobile = #{mobile},
WHERE id = #{id}
